20101226023419.000|20101226023421.000|CC1|COMPLETELY DISSIMILAR TO WHAT I 
20101226023421.000|20101226023421.000|CC1|EXPERIENCE.                     
20101226023421.000|20101226023423.000|CC1|>> MICHAEL J. FOX WAS BORN IN   
20101226023423.000|20101226023425.000|CC1|CANADA IN 1961, AND THEN IN     
20101226023425.000|20101226023427.000|CC1|1979, HE DECIDED HE WANTED TO

20101226023440.000|20101226023442.000|CC1|P. KEATON ON "FAMILY TIES."     
20101226023442.000|20101226023445.000|CC1|>> WHERE'S MALLORY?

20101226023500.000|20101226023501.000|CC1|GIRLFRIEND ON "FAMILY TIES."    
20101226023501.000|20101226023502.000|CC1|>> I LOVE YOU.

20101226023504.000|20101226023505.000|CC1|MICHAEL STARTED WITH THE TRILOGY
20101226023505.000|20101226023507.000|CC1|"BACK TO THE FUTURE," AND IT    
20101226023507.000|20101226023512.000|CC1|ELEVATED HIM FROM A TV STAR TO A

20101226023521.000|20101226023523.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY FOR ME TO DO ANOTHER
20101226023523.000|20101226023523.000|CC1|FILM.

20101226023529.000|20101226023531.000|CC1|BILLION DOLLARS WORLDWIDE, BUT  
20101226023531.000|20101226023533.000|CC1|CAN YOU IMAGINE IT BEING PLAYED 
20101226023533.000|20101226023535.000|CC1|BY McDOLT?

20101226023536.000|20101226023537.000|CC1|AT THE HEIGHT OF HIS CAREER,    
20101226023537.000|20101226023539.000|CC1|MICHAEL GOT THE SHOCK OF HIS    
20101226023539.000|20101226023539.000|CC1|LIFE.                           
20101226023539.000|20101226023541.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE 30 YEARS OLD AND THE

20101226023542.000|20101226023543.000|CC1|>> I WAS SHOCKED.

20101226023545.000|20101226023547.000|CC1|>> I SAID THIS IS GOING TO BE AN

20101226023551.000|20101226023553.000|CC1|THE STAR, ALCOHOL.

20101226023556.000|20101226023559.000|CC1|DRINKING, WRITING IN HIS MEMOIR

20101226025043.000|20101226025047.000|CC1|>> BRAD PITT WAS BORN IN 1963 IN
20101226025047.000|20101226025047.000|CC1|SHAWNEY, OKLAHOMA.              
20101226025047.000|20101226025049.000|CC1|HIS FAMILY LATER MOVED TO       
20101226025049.000|20101226025050.000|CC1|SPRINGFIELD, MISSOURI, WHERE HE

20101226025053.000|20101226025055.000|CC1|MISSOURI TWO CREDITS SHY OF     
20101226025055.000|20101226025055.000|CC1|GRADUATING.

20101226025057.000|20101226025058.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA, WHERE HE WAS A      
20101226025058.000|20101226025059.000|CC1|CHAUFFEUR.                      
20101226025059.000|20101226025101.000|CC1|>> MY REAL NAME IS BRAD PITT.   
20101226025101.000|20101226025104.000|CC1|I WAS BORN WITH IT.
